drug.name: meningococcal quadrivalent (A,C,Y,W-135) conjugate vaccine inj VIAL

drugname.value: meningococcal quadrivalent (A,C,Y,W-135) conjugate vaccine inj VIAL

instruction.value: for 2 doses administered at least 3 months apart.

additionalnotes.value: Adults and children 2 years of age and older.
Infants and children 9 to 23 months of age.
